name: Findme ～３０才の夢追い人～
description:
This game is a Japanese visual novel.
sorry. This game is for Japanese only

This is a story of anguish and conflict.

At the age of 30, the unsold actor Ryo Matsumoto is suffering from the idea that the main character does not want to give up his dream and that he should give up his dream.

I don't audition.
The part-time job doesn't last either.
I don't even have a girlfriend.

Even if he loses his dream and realizes that he is not talented
Can you still dream ...?
